Deploy the Shiny app with rsconnect to shinyapps.io

Source: R/deploy_shiny.R
deploy_shiny.Rd

This is really just a simple wrapper

Usage

deploy_shiny(
  path = here::here("app/"),
  files = NULL,
  account.name,
  name.app = "shiny_cast",
  name.token,
  name.secret
)

Arguments

path

app folder path

files

files in folder path to deploy

account.name

shinyapps account name

name.app

name of deployed app

name.token

stored name of token

name.secret

stored name of secret

Value

deploy

On this page

Developed by Andreas Gammelgaard Damsbo.
